title: Likely Bodoni Photoype sample
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725020735im_/http:/typophile.com/files/native-funk-flash_5248.jpg)

book title from 1974. appears to be a somewhat tall and narrow bodoni phototype sample, but some characters elude me, particularly the capital 'N' and lowercase 'k.'
author: daveyjones

comments.content: It’s basically [Lucian Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140725020735/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/bitstream/lucian_std_bold/ot_tt/specimen/tester/?&fg=000000&bg=ffffff&sample_size=45&sample_text=Native%20Funk%20%26%20Flash&ft=liga) by the eponymous Lucian Bernhard, but some details in the digital version—most notably the ampersand—are off.
